data.title: Marketing AI Keynote Speaker
data.meta_description: Learn how marketing keynote speaker Christopher S. Penn will awaken your audience. Book him to speak today at your next event.
data.meta_site_name: Christopher S. Penn - Marketing AI Keynote Speaker
data.text:
Watch AI Keynote Speaker Christopher Penn

Audiences demand more of events every year, but one demand is timeless: speakers who deliver value they can try out as soon as they return home. Learn why event planners and audiences get incredible value year after year from my talks.

The Almost Timely Newsletter

Marketing expert Jay Baer says, “Of the 50 or so email newsletters I get weekly, my favorite is the one from Christopher Penn. I learn something EVERY time.” Each Sunday, you’ll receive the top stories of the week in marketing, AI, advertising, communications, tech, and economics, plus original thought starters.

The Latest
